channel.title: Comments on: Butterscotch Steamed Pudding – Daring Bakers Challenge April 2010

item.title: By: nick
item.dc:creator: nick
item.description: Hi, Wondering if anyone can help me, I am looking for a receipe that my mum used to make for us as kids. I can't remember the exact name but it was a steamed pudding, I think butterscotch flavoured. It is not the syrup pudding as this pudding had no sauce running down the sides or you didn't pour any sauce over it. It was just a butterscotch sponge type base then it had a thick layer of butterscotch stuff that was on top of the pudding. If anyone has any idea could they let me know. Thanks Nick
item.content:encoded:
Hi, Wondering if anyone can help me, I am looking for a receipe that my mum used to make for us as kids. I can’t remember the exact name but it was a steamed pudding, I think butterscotch flavoured. It is not the syrup pudding as this pudding had no sauce running down the sides or you didn’t pour any sauce over it. It was just a butterscotch sponge type base then it had a thick layer of butterscotch stuff that was on top of the pudding. If anyone has any idea could they let me know.
Thanks Nick

item.title: By: betty
item.dc:creator: betty
item.description: this looks great and the sauce omg...! :O)
item.content:encoded: this looks great and the sauce omg…! :O)

item.title: By: Barbara Bakes
item.dc:creator: Barbara Bakes
item.description: That sauce looks so gooey and delicious. I love your "nothing that a little sauce won't cover up comment. Great job on this challenge.
item.content:encoded: That sauce looks so gooey and delicious. I love your “nothing that a little sauce won’t cover up comment. Great job on this challenge.

item.title: By: bunkycooks

item.description: I like your take on the challenge. The caramel sauce looks yummy!
item.content:encoded: I like your take on the challenge. The caramel sauce looks yummy!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I like the way you served your steamed pudding with sauce - it gives you the best of both worlds!
item.content:encoded: I like the way you served your steamed pudding with sauce – it gives you the best of both worlds!

item.title: By: Jill @ Jillicious Discoveries
item.dc:creator: Jill @ Jillicious Discoveries
item.description: Oh this pudding might be my favorite yet!! It looks so delicious and I love the butterscotch sauce over it--perfect! :)

item.title: By: Jenni

item.description: Great job! Your steamed pudding looks fantastic!!!!
item.content:encoded: Great job! Your steamed pudding looks fantastic!!!!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I love the challenge this month because I don't think I have ever seen such a variety of results! From savory to sweet. Sometimes they are very much the same; this time, everyone got really creative. (I think the suet made everyone take a step back!) Love butterscotch!
item.content:encoded:
I love the challenge this month because I don’t think I have ever seen such a variety of results! From savory to sweet. Sometimes they are very much the same; this time, everyone got really creative. (I think the suet made everyone take a step back!)
Love butterscotch!
